content.rendered:
Pearl Residence, Pearl View Estate, Enugu

The 4 Bedroom Fully Detached Duplex is located within Pearl View Estate, Enugu, an exclusively serviced estate in the heart of Enugu, Nigeria’s coal city. The estate is a private collection of upscale contemporary duplexes.

The four-bedroom detached duplex is also ideal for a large family. They include features such as a living room, dining room, guest room en-suite, main lounge with dining area, laundry room, pantry, private lounge, box room, master bedroom with walk-in closet, entrance porch, and plenty of parking space.

Title: Certificate of Occupancy

Neighborhood:

  • Akanu Ibiam International Airport
  • Caritas University o Emenite Aluminium Company

Residence Facilities:

  • Well paved external areas with exotic Horticulture
  • Standby Generator
  • Security and Intercom System
  • Spacious Individual Parking Space
  • Estate Management Service
  • Waste Disposal Unit
  • Central water treatment plant
  • Central security system

Price:

  • Outright: ₦57,600,000
  • 12 Months: ₦63,360,000 (Initial deposit of ₦9.6 Million)
  • 18 Months: ₦66,520,000 (Initial deposit of ₦19.2 Million)
  • 24 Months: ₦73,180,800 (Initial deposit of ₦21.6 Million)

Pearl Residence Subscription Form

1 file(s) 1.38 MB
Download
